Text: Fa-i abo kʼomi je̩ ñw ma, dʼumi te̩ achuke̩,
Ile e̩wñ naje̩ ugbo ukpahiu o̩wo̩-ma?
Ma gbo̩gbe̩ te̩ ñw ubie̩ kpʼebi
ma chi eñmi etutuʼka,
Ma fʼuma ne bʼef amone̩ te̩;
Todule̩ ma gugu ef ukpolo ki abailo,
Ma jʼef etutu akwa;
Amo̩ma ame̩nidada kpʼamo̩ma abo u ma ma nʼodu n ma che,
Omi la mud eli-ma fa-i me̩,
Ma hihie̩ne̩-mi, ma je̩ te̩mʼumi n;
Todabu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩cha o̩o̩do̩-mi kpare kʼi laño̩ fʼumi chʼukata,
Ame̩nofogoli akwane̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-mi,
Ma fʼo̩na e-mi kpabie̩,
Ma wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩do̩ ma gulo̩ awa;
E̩wñ ubailo murida abʼumi ma;
Onugo-mi kwodafo efu-mi fa-i me̩;
Odu achiku achiku-mi akpa mi na,
Ukpahiu lile fʼe̩wñ o̩la-mi kpabie̩;
I mʼumi du rikpolo tʼef e̩pio̩,
Naraku dʼuwe̩, e̩ la dohi ñw mi n;
Uwe̩murida e̩ne̩ kʼi ache mi o̩lachi;
Uwe̩ adʼumi kwane̩ tʼoj afu,
I-i, u chema kʼuwe̩ adʼumi wa ñw uku,
E̩ne̩ kʼunyi gulo̩ bʼo ma anʼo̩wo̩ data n?
Omi raku tod e̩ne̩ ki achʼo̩bata o̩jo̩ te̩ n?
E̩gba kʼomi muda neju e̩nyo̩, e̩bie̩ne̩ lewa;
E̩do̩-mi ache giligili, i ñmi n;
Año̩la-mi kpa, i muda chʼolu che n;
Omaye amogbemgbem omi che,
Año̩-mi da chi da chi, oñ i alaño̩,
Todule̩ umolo-mi mud edaido̩,
